title: Add [* TO *] option to spatial fields.
description: It would be nice to have [* TO *] work on a spatial field.  Not necessarily any range query but this specific one.  I don't know if there are other non-spatial fields where this won't work, but it'd be nice if this was universal.

comments.author: David Smiley
comments.content: Changing to a bug; arguably all fields ought to support this range query, and not doing so is a bug.
